admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
Overall, the project is rated as
            satisfactory. Key lessons learned during project
            implementation include: 1) The quality of implementation
            depended very much on the level of precision and rigor in
            preparing and appraising the components of the project. 2)
            More emphasis should be put on the use of consultants and on
            training. 3) Creation of Project Implementation Unit was
            deemed to be an appropriate decision to smooth project
            implementation. 4) Delays must be anticipated prior to the
            project implementation phase. 5) Land reclamation and
            resettlement issues must be properly assessed prior to
            project implementation. 6) Close collaboration between the
            Port Enterprises and the overseeing ministry would help
            better define the scope and design of the infrastructure. 7)
            Comparisons of implementation experiences in the different
            ports brought to light the fact that the many delays were
            caused also by the lack of information concerning available
            land, environmental impact, and the relocation of occupants.
